channel.title: General Family Blogs Money Rss Aggregation Mashup on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Family Blogs Money Rss Aggregation Mashup on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: I love making these silly aggregate sites - reedbooks.org
item.description: I started with thestoryofharper.com and then I created the site for hiromi and myself. So after writing all the cool classes to make this easy I decided to make the blogs.nata2.org site and then tonight I redid the reedbooks.org site to be an aggregate of my families blogs. fun fun. The sites follow a pretty simple formula. Basically all i am doing is picking up the RSS feeds of a particular set of blogs and displaying them nicely.
